reviewText:
Erotic Heat Volume 1 is a variation of the "Penthouse Video"/"Playboy Video" series. A bunch of girls getting nude in various scenes from bath to kitchen, car to gym, etc... Most of the models, from what I can tell, come from either Suze Randall series, Penthouse Magazine, or some other similar magazines. Most of these models were from the mid - late 1990's, as the video is copyright 1998, and a DVD no less.
No commentary, as it's just models posing and stripping for the viewer with some music in the background.

Overall a nice video for those who are into Playboy, Penthouse, etc. The quality of this video is pretty good, as it is of DVD format. Video is about 47 minutes long and has 6 chapters. If you are looking for hardcore, then this is not the video for you. This is mostly softcore with some lesbian scenes, done in a "Playboy-esque" video style.

Caution, when I received this video, I did not get a typical DVD case, I got a typical CD case, the same CD case you get when you purchase a music CD. Unclear as to why it was not in a DVD case. DVD itself has no scratches or smudges, so I was happy with that.
I expected hetero erotica, and was disappointed that they were lesbian videos.  I would like to send them back and have them replaced with hetero erotica videos

I have all FOUR volumes in the Erotic Heat series. The common factors: attractive nude ladies, generallly good music, great editing, and a touch of class. These DVDs are NOT amateurish videos. They are professionally filmed, artistically directed vignettes set to music, and you'll actually be proud to own and show them.

EROTIC HEAT VOL. 1 ***

1-A hot tease spends more time sponge washing herself than the red sports car with the "Fantasy" plates. Filmed outside. Flashy music will etch itself in your brain. One of the best vignettes in the series.

2-Two lovely construction crew workers use a ladder as their prop of choice. The Sax-y music is just okay.

3-A scantily clad maid watches two elegant ladies enjoy dessert and champagne. Nice music, but the scene drags.

4-Same maid does a strip tease in the kitchen. Whipped cream and a strawberry. Neither the music, the lady, or the vignette is memorable.

5-A jogger has thought flashes of making out with another lady on an exercise bench. Filmed entirely outside. The pulsating music is excellent.

6-Five women get steamy poolside. Jacuzzi and waterfall backdrops. Dreamlike electronic music and great night photography.

EROTIC HEAT VOL. 2 (Hot Salsa) ***

1-Voyeuristic lingerie number. One inside; one on the balcony. Relaxing music.

2-Another lingerie number. Dreamy music plays as she wakes up and plays with herself in bed. Pretty boring.

3-Yet another lingerie dance on a balcony. But this stunningly beautiful lady is definitely hot salsa! Moderately good music.

4-Poolside party of six Snappy music! Filmed in daylight.

5-Chip and dip romantic duo. For a change, the background music is a song. Rather forgettable.

6-Two women in a rose petal bath. The main attraction here is the soothing music. It breathes for you, and it gently caresses the soul!

7-Meanwhile, back at the jacuzzi. Routine ongoings. Routine music. Next!

8-That hot salsa lady from vignette #3 is back with a girlfriend. Very, very sensual art house piece. Low key music gets a bit tedious, though.

EROTIC HEAT VOL. 3 (Tight Moves) ****

1-A female chauffeur watches in the rear view mirror as her classy passenger does a strip tease. Great music! We return to this scene repeatedly between the vignettes. A few gym scenes spliced in.

2-A hot and sweaty time in the gym. An incredibly beautiful blonde watches the exercisers through a large window. Another uber-sexy lady with tight leopard pants does a strip tease guaranteed to fry your senses. Great music! And one of the best vignettes in the series.

3-Body massage. Low key music. Nice, but nothing exceptional.

4-Indoor volleyball game is called off when the alluring blonde from vignette #2 gives a booty call. Nice music.

5-Sauna sequence is something of a dud. Low key music is okay.

6-The incredibly sexy blonde from vignettes #2 and #4 takes a shower alone, but is eventually joined by others for a great lineup scene. This one has all the right moves! ---Warning! The music is highly contagious! You'll never get it out of your head!

7-Back to the chauffeur and the classy strip tease in the back seat. Great closing sequence guaranteed to make you squirm.

EROTIC HEAT VOL. 4 (Body Language) ****

1-Incredibly beautiful murderess gets sensual with a huge gun in an elevator. Catchy music, and one of the best vignettes in the series.

2-Three ladies in the soft glow of a fireplace, get very warm with each other. Champagne, marshmallows, and pillows. Soft, romantic music.

3-Charming Asian with a great smile does stretch exercises, then takes a very sensual shower. Two great musical numbers. The rousing shower sequence is one of my favorite vignettes in the series.

4-Three ladies and a bottle of suntan lotion. Somewhat boring. The music is just okay.

5-A decadent blonde and a bath full of suds. Beautiful washed out photography and classy music.

6-A sex kitten dressed in chaps and dark glasses, throbbing music, and a strip tease on a motorcyle. On stage, in the spotlight. A really hot number that will get your motor running!

If Amazon.com doesn't have the full collection in stock, you can order from [...]

There may be a few duds amongst the numerous vignettes in the series, and some are a bit repetitious, but every disc has at least one exceptional vignette. Buy them all, and enjoy. You'll be back often, I guarantee it!
Duff likes it. Duff likes Sabrina Allen. Duff bought it. Duff reccomends.
